name: DI(e)NO(t)
description:
Turn the whole of History into one long dinosaur era! Make your dinosaurs survive!

As a guide of dinos, your goal is to ensure the survival of a pack of cute diplodocuses. Guide them with your mouse (left click) for as long as possible! 🕓

Help them avoid natural disasters!

However, be careful, catastrophes will arise and try to wipe your friends out of existence! 🌋☄ Use their herd behavior to keep them out of danger.

Make them live throughout History!

If you're skilled enough, your giants won't disappear and will live on beyond Prehistoric times! Can you bring them to the future? 🚀

Team
  • Bérénice Guérin - Game Art
  • Chiara Rosmarino - Game & Level Design, Programming
  • Jérémy Fongue - Lead Programming
  • Thibaud Ligneul - Management, Sound

Want more challenge? Try to finish with several dinos! 💪

Small bonus for curious ones: you can interact with the title-screen dinos, no stamina needed! Or just watch them live their life peacefully… 🥰

A game made in 72h for the 46th Ludum Dare.
